S06vchedppu:2: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān /
S06vchedppu:5: anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham ardhatrayodaśabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ /
S06vchedppu:6: atha khalu bhagavān pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya /
S06vchedppu:9: śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pādau prakṣālya nyaṣīdad bhagavān /
S06vchedppu:10: prajñapta evāsane paryaṃkam ābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtim upasthāpya /
S06vchedppu:11: atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkkraman upasaṃkkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavaṃtaṃ tṛḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtvā ekāṃte nyaṣīdan /
S06vchedppu:13: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ tasyām eva pariṣadi sannipatito 'bhūt sanniṣaṇṇaḥ /
S06vchedppu:14: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇāmya bhagavaṃtam etad avocat /
S06vchedppu:15: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad eva tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhisatvā mahāsatvā anuparigṛhītāḥ parameṇānugraheṇa /
S06vchedppu:16: yāvad eva tathāgatena bodhisatvāḥ parittāḥ paramayā parindanayā /
S06vchedppu:20: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ subhūtim etad avocat /
S06vchedppu:21: sādhu sādhu subhūte evam etat subhūte anuparigṛhītās tathāgatena bodhisatvāḥ parameṇānugraheṇa /
S06vchedppu:23: tena hi subhūte śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye /
S06vchedppu:27: evaṃ bhagavann ity āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S06vchedppu:30: iha subhūte bodhisatvayānasaṃprasthitair evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam /
S06vchedppu:31_0: yāvaṃtaḥ satvāḥ satvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhītaḥ aṇḍajā vā jarāyujā vā saṃsvedajā vā upapādukā
S06vchedppu:31_1: vā rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo vā saṃjñino vā asaṃjñino vā naiva saṃjñino nāsaṃjñinaḥ yāvat
S06vchedppu:31_2: satvadhātuḥ prajñapyamānaḥ prajñapyate te mayā sarve anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyāḥ /
S06vchedppu:32: evam aparimāṇāṃś ca satvān parinirvāpayitavyāḥ na ca kaścit satvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati /
S06vchedppu:34: sacet subhūte bodhisatvasya satvasaṃjñā pravartate na sa bodhisatva iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06vchedppu:36: na sa subhūte bodhisatvo vaktavyo yasya satvasaṃjñā pravarteta jīvasaṃjñā vā pudgalasaṃjñā vā pravarteta /
S06vchedppu:38: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisatvena na vastupratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam /
S06vchedppu:40: na rūpapratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam na śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyeṣu na dharmapratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam /
S06vchedppu:41: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisatvena dānaṃ dātavyam /
S06vchedppu:44: yaḥ subhūte bodhisatvaḥ apratiṣṭhito dānaṃ dadāti tasya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇam udgrahītum /
S06vchedppu:45: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte sukaraṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi ākāśasya pramāṇam udgrahītum /
S06vchedppu:55: evam etat subhūte yo bodhisatvo 'pratiṣṭhito dānaṃ dadāti tasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇam udgrahītum /
S06vchedppu:56: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte evaṃ bodhisatvena dānamayaṃ puṇyakṛyāvastuṃ dānaṃ dātavyam /
S06vchedppu:58: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte tathāgato lakṣaṇasaṃpadā draṣṭavyaḥ /
S06vchedppu:59: bhagavān āha na lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ /
S06vchedppu:61: yā sā tathāgatena lakṣaṇasaṃpad bhāsitā saivālakṣaṇasaṃpat /
S06vchedppu:62: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ subhūtim etad avocat /
S06vchedppu:67: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavaṃtam etad avocat /
S06vchedppu:68: asti bhagavan kecit satvāḥ bhaviṣyaṃty anāgate 'dhvani paścimāyāṃ paṃcāśatyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ ye imeṣv evaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāṃtapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu bhūtasaṃjñām utpādayiṣyaṃti /
S06vchedppu:71: asti kecit satvāḥ bhaviṣyaṃty anāgate 'dhvani ye imeṣv evaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāṃtapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu bhūtasaṃjñām utpādayiṣyaṃti /
S06vchedppu:72: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bhaviṣyaṃty anāgate 'dhvani bodhisatvā mahāsatvā paścimāyāṃ paṃcāśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne śīlavaṃto guṇavaṃtaḥ prajñāvaṃto bhaviṣyaṃti /
S06vchedppu:73: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisatvā ekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyaṃti /
S06vchedppu:75: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte anekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyaṃti anekabuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlā bhaviṣyaṃti /
S06vchedppu:76: ye imeṣv evaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāṃtapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣv ekacittaprasādamātram api pratilapsyaṃte /
S06vchedppu:77: jñātās te subhūte tathāgatena dṛṣṭās te subhūte tathāgatena sarve te aprameyaṃ puṇyaskaṃdhaṃ prasaviṣyaṃti pratigṛhīṣyaṃti /
S06vchedppu:79: na hi teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisatvānām ātmasaṃjñā pravartsyate na satvasaṃjñā na jīvasaṃjñā na pudgalasaṃjñā pravartsyate /
S06vchedppu:80: nāpi teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisatvānāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravartsyate nādharmasaṃjñā nāpi teṣāṃ saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā pravartsyate /
S06vchedppu:82: sacet subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravartsyate sa eva teṣām ātmagrāho bhavet /
S06vchedppu:84: saced adharmasaṃjñā pravarteta sa eva teṣām ātmagrāho bhavet /
S06vchedppu:87: na khalu punaḥ subhūte dharmodgrahītavyo nādharmaḥ /
S06vchedppu:88: tasmād idaṃ sandhāya tathāgatena bhāṣitaṃ kolopamaṃ dharmaparyāyam ājānadbhiḥ dharmāḥ eva prahātavyāḥ prāg evādharmāḥ /
S06vchedppu:90: punar aparaṃ bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ subhūtim etad avocat /
S06vchedppu:91: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kācit tathāgatenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā /
S06vchedppu:94: yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi nāsti sa kaścid dharmo yas tathāgatenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā /
S06vchedppu:95: nāsti sa kaścid dharmo yas tathāgatena deśitaḥ /
S06vchedppu:103: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte ya imāṃ tṛsāhasramahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnapratipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadyāt /
S06vchedppu:104: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt /
S06vchedppu:107: sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt /
S06vchedppu:110: tasmāt tathāgato bhāṣate puṇyaskandhaḥ askandha iti bhagavān āha /
S06vchedppu:111: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ tṛsāhasrāmahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnapratipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadyāt /
S06vchedppu:112: yaś ceto dharmaparyāyad aṃtaśaś catuṣpadikām api gāthām udgṛhya parebhyo deśayet saṃprakāśayed ayam eva tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt /
S06vchedppu:115: ato nirjātā hi subhūte tathāgatānām anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
S06vchedppu:118: buddhadharmāḥ buddhadhannā iti subhūte abuddhadharmāś caiva te /
S06vchedppu:121: api nu srotāpannasya evaṃ bhavati mayā srotāpattiphalaṃ prāptam iti /
S06vchedppu:126: na hi sa bhagavan kiṃcid āpannaḥ /
S06vchedppu:128: na rūpam āpanno na śabdān na gandhān na rasān na spraṣṭavyān na dharmān āpannaḥ /
S06vchedppu:132: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sakṛdāgāminaḥ evaṃ bhaven mayā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptam iti /
S06vchedppu:137: na sakṛdāgāmino evaṃ bhavati mayā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptam iti /
S06vchedppu:139: na hi sa kaścid dharmaḥ yaḥ sakṛdāgāmitvam āpannaḥ /
S06vchedppu:143: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nv anāgāmina evaṃ bhavati mayā anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptam iti /
S06vchedppu:151: api nv arhato evaṃ bhavati mayārhatvaṃ prāptam iti /
S06vchedppu:155: na hi bhagavan sa kaścid dharmo yo 'rhan nāmaḥ /
S06vchedppu:156: saced bhagavann arhata evaṃ bhaven mayārhatvaṃ prāptam iti /
S06vchedppu:164: na ca me bhagavann evaṃ bhavati aham asmi arhann iti /
S06vchedppu:165: sacen mama bhagavann evaṃ bhaven mayārhatvaṃ prāptam iti /
S06vchedppu:174: kaścid dharmas tathāgatena dīpaṃkarāt tathāgatād arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhād udgṛhītaḥ /
S06vchedppu:178: na sa kaścid dharmaḥ tathāgatena dīpaṃkarāt tathāgatād arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhād udgṛhītaḥ /
S06vchedppu:181: yaḥ kaścit subhūte bodhisatvo evaṃ vaded ahaṃ kṣetravyūhān niṣpādayiṣyāmīti sa vitathaṃ vadet /
S06vchedppu:183: kṣetravyūhāḥ kṣetravyūhā iti subhūte avyūhā hy ete tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
S06vchedppu:186: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisatvena evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ apratiṣṭhitaṃ /
S06vchedppu:190: tad yathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo bhavet /
S06vchedppu:191: yasyaivaṃrūpa ātmabhāvaḥ syāt tad yathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājā /
S06vchedppu:192: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte mahān sa ātmabhāvo bhavet /
S06vchedppu:204: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yāvaṃtyo gaṃgānadyāṃ vālukās tāvaṃtya eva gaṃgānadyo bhaveyuḥ /
S06vchedppu:205: api nu tāsu bahvyo vālukā bhaveyuḥ /
S06vchedppu:207: tā eva tāvad bhagavan bahvyo gaṃgānadyo bhaveyuḥ prāg eva yās tāsu vālukāḥ /
S06vchedppu:209: ārocayāmi te subhūte prativedayāmi te yāvaṃtyas tāsu gaṃgānadīṣu vālukā bhaveyuḥ /
S06vchedppu:210: tāvaṃtyo lokadhātavaḥ kaścid eva strī vā puruṣo vā saptaratnapratipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt /
S06vchedppu:212: api nu sā strī vā puruṣo vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt /
S06vchedppu:215: sā strī vā puruso vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt /
S06vchedppu:217: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte tāvaṃtyo lokadhātavaḥ saptaratnapratipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadyāt /
S06vchedppu:218: yaś ceto dharmaparyāyād aṃtaśaś catuṣpadikām api gāthām udgṛhya parebhyo deśayet /
S06vchedppu:219: ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasunuyād aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam /
S06vchedppu:221: api tu khalu subhūte yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe ito dharmaparyāyād aṃtaśaś catuṣpadikām api gāthāṃ bhāṣyeta vā deśyeta vā sa pṛthivīpradeśaś caityabhūto bhavet /
S06vchedppu:222: sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya kaḥ punar vādaḥ subhūte ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyaṃti parameṇa te āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyaṃti /
S06vchedppu:223: tasmiṃś ca pṛthivīpradeśe śāstā viharaty anyatarānyataro vā gurusthānīyaḥ /
S06vchedppu:225: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavaṃtam etad avocat /
S06vchedppu:226: ko nāmāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ kathaṃ cainaṃ dhārayāmi /
S06vchedppu:227: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ subhūtim etad avocat /
S06vchedppu:231: yaiva subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatena bhāṣitā / saivāpāramitā /
S06vchedppu:233: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa kaścid dharmo tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
S06vchedppu:236: na sa kaścid bhagavaṃ dharmo yaḥ tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
S06vchedppu:238: yāvataḥ subhūte tṛsāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau pṛthivīrajaḥ kaccit tad bahu bhavet /
S06vchedppu:242: pṛthivīrajaḥ tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ arajaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
S06vchedppu:244: yā sā lokadhātur adhātuḥ sā tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
S06vchedppu:248: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte dvātṛṃśadbhir mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho draṣṭavyaḥ /
S06vchedppu:252: yāni tāni bhagavan dvātṛṃśanmahāpuraṣalakṣaṇāni tathāgatena bhāṣitāny alakṣaṇāni tathāgatena bhāṣitāni tasmād ucyaṃte dvātṛṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānīti /
S06vchedppu:255: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā gaṃgānadīvālukopamān ātmabhāvān parityajet /
S06vchedppu:256: yaś ceto dharmaparyāyāc catuṣpadikām api gāthām udgṛhya parebhyo deśayet /
S06vchedppu:257: ayaṃ tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasunuyād aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam /
S06vchedppu:259: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ dharmapravegenāśrūṇi prāmuṃcat /
S06vchedppu:260: pravartayaṃ so 'śrūṇi parimārjya bhagavaṃtam etad avocat /
S06vchedppu:265: jñānam utpannaṃ na mayā jātv eva dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutapūrvaḥ /
S06vchedppu:267: āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyaṃti ya iha sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe bhūtasaṃjñām utpādayiṣyaṃti /
S06vchedppu:269: bhūtasaṃjñā saivāsaṃjñā tasmāt tathāgato bhāṣate bhūtasaṃjñā bhūtasaṃjñeti /
S06vchedppu:271: na mama bhagavann āścaryaṃ yad ahaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣyamāṇam avakalpayāmy adhimucyāmi /
S06vchedppu:272: ye te bhagavann imaṃ dharmaparyāyam udgṛhīṣyaṃti paryavāpsyaṃti dhārayiṣyaṃti /
S06vchedppu:275: api tu khalu punaḥ bhagavan na teṣām ātmasaṃjñā pravartsyate /
S06vchedppu:278: tat kasya hetoḥ yāsāv ātmasaṃjñā saivāsaṃjñā /
S06vchedppu:283: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ subhūtim etad avocat /
S06vchedppu:284: evam etat subhūte evam etat subhūte paramāścaryasamanvāgatās te satvā bhaviṣyaṃti /
S06vchedppu:285: ya iha sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe śrutvā nottrasiṣyaṃti /
S06vchedppu:290: yāṃ ca tathāgataḥ paramapāramitāṃ bhāṣate tām aparimāṇā buddhā bhagavaṃto bhāṣaṃte /
S06vchedppu:293: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yā tathāgatasya kṣāṃtipāramitā saivāpāramitā /
S06vchedppu:295: yadā me subhūte kaliṃgarājā aṃgapratyaṃgāny acchetsīn nāsīn me tasmin samaye ātmasaṃjñā vā satvasaṃjñā vā jīvasaṃjñā vā pudgalasaṃjñā vā na me kācit saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā babhūva /
S06vchedppu:297: sacet subhūte mama tasmin samaye ātmasamjñābhaviṣyat /
S06vchedppu:299: abhijānāmy ahaṃ subhūte atīte 'dhvani paṃca jātiśatāni yad ahaṃ kṣāṃtivādī riṣir abhū tadāpi me nātmasaṃjñā babhūva /
S06vchedppu:300: na satvasaṃjñā na jīvasaṃjñā na pudgalasaṃjñā /
S06vchedppu:301: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvasaṃjñā vivarjayitvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayitavyam /
S06vchedppu:309: tasmād eva tathāgato bhāṣate rūpāpratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam /
S06vchedppu:311: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisatvenaivaṃ dānaparityāgaḥ parityajyaḥ sarvasatvānām arthāya /
S06vchedppu:313: ya eva te sarvasatvāḥ tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ ta evāsatvāḥ /
S06vchedppu:314: bhūtavādī subhūte tathāgataḥ satyavādī tathāvādī tathāgato na vitathāvādī tathāgato /
S06vchedppu:316: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yaḥ tathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddho deśito vā na tatra satyaṃ na mṛṣā /
S06vchedppu:318: evaṃ vastupatito bodhisatvo draṣṭavyo yo vastupatitaṃ dānaṃ parityajati /
S06vchedppu:319: tad yathāpi nāma subhūte cakṣuṣmān puruṣo vibhātāyāṃ rātryāṃ sūrye 'bhyudgate nānāvidhāni rūpāṇi paśyet /
S06vchedppu:320: evaṃ bodhisatvo draṣṭavyo yo vastvapatitaṃ dānaṃ parityajati /
S06vchedppu:322: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ye kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyam udgrahīṣyaṃti /
S06vchedppu:326: jñātās te subhūte tathāgatena dṛṣṭās te subhūte tathāgatena buddhās te tathāgatena /
S06vchedppu:327: sarve te satvāḥ aprameyaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyaṃti /
S06vchedppu:329: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā pūrvāhṇakālasamaye gaṃgānadīvālukopamān ātmabhāvān parityajet /
S06vchedppu:333: na pratikṣiped ayam eva tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt /
S06vchedppu:342: ayaṃ ca dharmaparyāyaḥ tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ agrayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ satvānām arthāya /
S06vchedppu:348: jñātās te subhūte tathāgatena dṛṣṭās te subhūte tathāgatena /
S06vchedppu:349: sarve te satvāḥ aprameyeṇa puṇyaskandhena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyaṃti /
S06vchedppu:352: na hi śakyaṃ subhūte ayaṃ dharmo hīnādhimuktikaiḥ śrotum /
S06vchedppu:353: nātmadṛṣṭikaiḥ na satvadṛṣṭikaiḥ na jīvadṛṣṭikaiḥ na pudgaladṛṣṭikaiḥ śakyaṃ śrotum udgrahītuṃ vā dhārayituṃ vā vācayituṃ vā paryavāptuṃ vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate /
S06vchedppu:355: api tu subhūte yatra pṛthivīpradeśe idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśayiṣyati /
S06vchedppu:357: sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya vandanīyaḥ pradakṣiṇīkaraṇīyaś ca sa pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati /
S06vchedppu:360: ye te subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imān evaṃrūpāṃ sūtrāṃtān udgrahīsyaṃti dhārayiṣyaṃti paryavāpsyaṃti /
S06vchedppu:361: te paribhūtā bhaviṣyaṃti suparibhūtāś ca bhaviṣyaṃti /
S06vchedppu:363: yāni teṣāṃ satvānāṃ paurvajanmikāni karmāṇi kṛtāny apāyasaṃvartanīyāni dṛṣṭa eva dharme paribhūtatayā pūrvajanmikāny aśubhāni karmāṇi kṣapayiṣyaṃti /
S06vchedppu:366_0: abhijānāmy ahaṃ subhūte atīte 'dhvani asaṃkhyeye kalpe asaṃkhyeyatare dīpaṃkarasya
S06vchedppu:366_2: abhūvan ye mayā ārādhitā ārādhayetvā na virādhitā /
S06vchedppu:367_0: yac ca mayā subhūte buddhā bhagavaṃtaḥ ārāgitā ārāgayetvā na virāgitā yac ca carime
S06vchedppu:367_1: kāle paścimikāyaṃ paṃcāśatyāṃ vartamānāyām imaṃ sūtrāṃtam udgrahīṣyaṃti dhārayiṣyaṃti
S06vchedppu:368: asya subhūte puṇyaskandhasyāṃtikād eṣa pūrvakaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti sāhasṛtamām api /
S06vchedppu:371: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api upaniśām api na kṣamate /
S06vchedppu:373: sacet subhūte teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā puṇyaskandhaṃ bhāṣet /
S06vchedppu:374: yāvaṃtaḥ te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasmin samaye puṇyaskandhaṃ pratigṛhṇaṃti /
S06vchedppu:375: unmādaṃ te satvāḥ prāpnuyuḥ cittavikṣepaṃ vā gaccheyuḥ /
